name: Home Automation Control Center
short_description:
This Perl/PostgreSQL application enables to control various do-it-yourself home automation products (such as air conditioning units or electric radiators).
The code is highly portable for used with other DB (for example MySQL).
It may be used as a scheduler with light modifications.

User Interface is provided by the Home Automation Control Center UI project (https://sourceforge.net/projects/climcontrolui)
summary: An application to control DIY home automation products
